name: Crazy Chameleon
description:
Play as a hungry Chameleon and catch flies by extending your tongue.

Pretty simple to play, addictive and full of action.

Can you help the chameleon to eat the correct flies? then Help him to catch the right flies!
Make sure to protect Chameleon or you lose it all! Beware that you are catching same coloured flies.
Hurry and feel the exciting adventure theme with the chameleon and multicoloured flies.

# Interesting Game with Full of Action!
# Nice graphics!
# Addictive Game Play
# Colorful pleasure

Supported Languages
1) English
2) Japanese
3) German
4) Spanish
5) Korean
6) Russian
7) Italian
8) Portuguese
9) French
